DOC.brief_summary: - The goals of this study are to develop a lyophilization method for anterior lamellar transplants in Brasil and to make a comparative analysis among patients transplanted with lyophilized and optisol corneas
DOC.detailed_description: - After the development of a techinique to lyophilize corneas, we randomly assingned 20 patients with keratoconus and visual acuity of < 20/60, who signed the consent term and divided them into 2 groups. One group was transplanted with lyophilized corneas and the other group with optisol corneas. - Patients are being followed for 6 months with visual acuity, refraction, topography, orbscan, pachmetry, ultrasound biomicroscopy and confocal microscopy. - Results are going to be statistically analysed by SPSS program.
DOC.criteria: Keratoconus patient BCVA < 20/60 No systemic diseases Who signed the inform consent BCVA > 20/60 Presence of deep opacities Systemic diseases
